# This file contains a comprehensive, plain-text, scraper-friendly version of the WILDCAT documentation site.
# All key features, architecture, usage, warnings, and links are included for optimal extraction.

============================================================
WILDCAT - WhatsApp REST API
============================================================

â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—    â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•— â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•— â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—

â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘     â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘  â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘     â–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â•â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘   â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘   
â•šâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â•šâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘  â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘   â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘   
 â•šâ•â•â•â•šâ•â•â• â•šâ•â•â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•  â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•šâ•â•  â•šâ•â•   â•šâ•â•   
    WhatsApp Integration Layer for Data Connectivity And Transfer
    Enterprise-Grade WhatsApp REST API for Node.js

============================================================

WILDCAT is an open-source, enterprise-grade WhatsApp REST API for Node.js, designed for automation, bots, and integration with external services. It provides a clean HTTP interface, multi-account support, real-time webhooks, and robust media handling.

------------------------------------------------------------
Key Features
------------------------------------------------------------
- Multi-account WhatsApp management
- Send/receive messages, media, reactions, and statuses
- Real-time webhooks for automation (n8n, Zapier, etc.)
- GridFS media storage with direct-access endpoints
- REST API with 20+ endpoints
- Docker support for easy deployment
- Structured logging (HTTP, Baileys, app logs)
- Quick setup (5 minutes)
- WebSocket QR authentication
- Integration with external automation tools

------------------------------------------------------------
Architecture Overview
------------------------------------------------------------

External Services              WILDCAT API              WhatsApp
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•              â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•              â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

â”‚   n8n/      â”‚   REST API    â”‚  Express â”‚  Baileys    â”‚WhatsAppâ”‚

Features:
â€¢ Multi-Account Management    â€¢ Media Storage (GridFS)
â€¢ WebSocket QR Auth           â€¢ Structured Logging
â€¢ Real-time Webhooks          â€¢ Audio Conversion (ffmpeg)
â€¢ REST Endpoints (20+)        â€¢ Session Persistence

------------------------------------------------------------
Quick Start
------------------------------------------------------------
1. Clone: git clone https://github.com/NotoriousArnav/wildcat.git
2. Install: npm ci
3. Configure: Copy .env.example to .env and set MONGO_URL, DB_NAME
4. Start: npm start
5. Send message: Use /accounts/{id}/message/send endpoint

Example cURL:
curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/accounts/mybot/message/send \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"to": "1234567890@s.whatsapp.net", "message": "Hello! ğŸ±"}'

------------------------------------------------------------
API Overview
------------------------------------------------------------
- 20+ REST endpoints for account, message, media, webhook, and status management
- JSON request/response format
- See: https://notoriousarnav.github.io/wildcat/docs/api/endpoints

------------------------------------------------------------
Deployment
------------------------------------------------------------
- Docker support (production-ready, ffmpeg pre-installed)
- Can be deployed on any VPS or cloud
- See: https://notoriousarnav.github.io/wildcat/docs/guides/deployment

------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------

Supported Platforms:
â€¢ n8n (Visual Workflows)        â€¢ Custom Node.js/Python Apps
â€¢ Zapier (Automation)           â€¢ IFTTT (Triggers)
â€¢ Make.com (Integromat)         â€¢ Any HTTP Client

------------------------------------------------------------
Security & Compliance Notices
------------------------------------------------------------
- Unofficial WhatsApp integration (use at your own risk)
- Subject to WhatsApp rate limits and ban risk
- No built-in authenticationâ€”do not expose to public internet
- Recommended for: Development, testing, personal automation, small business bots
- Not recommended for: Spam, marketing at scale, production without security controls

------------------------------------------------------------
Documentation Links
------------------------------------------------------------
- Home: https://notoriousarnav.github.io/wildcat/
- Quickstart: https://notoriousarnav.github.io/wildcat/docs/getting-started/quickstart
- API Reference: https://notoriousarnav.github.io/wildcat/docs/api/endpoints
- Architecture: https://notoriousarnav.github.io/wildcat/docs/ARCHITECTURE
- Deployment Guide: https://notoriousarnav.github.io/wildcat/docs/guides/deployment
- Integration Examples: https://notoriousarnav.github.io/wildcat/docs/guides/integration-examples
- Troubleshooting: https://notoriousarnav.github.io/wildcat/docs/troubleshooting/common-issues
- GitHub: https://github.com/NotoriousArnav/wildcat
